snippet: A law signed by President Obama, which broadens restrictions on protests at military funerals, may well violate the Constitution.
abstract: Editorial contends that the law signed by Pres Obama, which broadens federal restrictions on protests at military funerals for members of the Armed Forces, may well violate the free speech of protesters.
lead_paragraph: A law signed by President Obama, which broadens restrictions on protests at military funerals, may well violate the Constitution.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
